nodes.title: Understand the stock market
nodes.desc: Familiarize yourself with the basics of the stock market, including types of stocks, trading hours, and market trends. [Investopedia](https://www.investopedia.com/stock-market-101/)

nodes.title: Choose a brokerage account
nodes.desc: Open a brokerage account with a reputable online broker to buy and sell stocks. [Fidelity](https://www.fidelity.com/)

nodes.title: Keep records
nodes.desc: Keep accurate records of your stock transactions, including purchase and sale dates, prices, and fees. [TurboTax](https://turbotax.intuit.com/)

nodes.title: Understand tax implications
nodes.desc: Understand the tax implications of buying and selling stocks, including capital gains and losses. [IRS](https://www.irs.gov/)

nodes.title: Seek professional advice
nodes.desc: Consider consulting a financial advisor or broker for personalized advice on buying and selling stocks. [NerdWallet](https://www.nerdwallet.com/blog/investing/financial-advisor/)

nodes.title: Use online trading platforms
nodes.desc: Utilize online trading platforms to buy and sell stocks quickly and efficiently. [Robinhood](https://robinhood.com/)

nodes.title: Set price alerts
nodes.desc: Set price alerts to notify you when a stock reaches a certain price. [Google Finance](https://finance.google.com/)

nodes.title: Consider dividend investing
nodes.desc: Invest in dividend-paying stocks to generate regular income. [Dividend](https://www.dividend.com/)

nodes.title: Evaluate company financials
nodes.desc: Analyze a company's financial statements to determine its financial health. [Morningstar](https://www.morningstar.com/)

nodes.title: Research industry trends
nodes.desc: Research industry trends and outlooks to determine the potential for growth. [IBISWorld](https://www.ibisworld.com/)

nodes.title: Monitor insider activity
nodes.desc: Monitor insider buying and selling activity to gauge a company's prospects. [Insider Monkey](https://www.insidermonkey.com/)

nodes.title: Use technical analysis
nodes.desc: Use technical analysis to identify patterns and trends in a stock's price and trading volume. [TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/)

nodes.title: Set a budget
nodes.desc: Determine how much money you want to invest in the stock market and set a budget for buying and selling stocks. [The Balance](https://www.thebalance.com/how-to-set-a-budget-for-investing-in-the-stock-market-357915)

nodes.title: Consider index funds
nodes.desc: Invest in index funds to track a particular market index, such as the S&P 500. [Vanguard](https://investor.vanguard.com/)

nodes.title: Evaluate ETFs
nodes.desc: Evaluate exchange-traded funds (ETFs) as an alternative to mutual funds. [ETF Database](https://www.etfdb.com/)

nodes.title: Research stocks
nodes.desc: Research different types of stocks, including growth stocks, dividend stocks, and index funds. [Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/)

nodes.title: Evaluate stock performance
nodes.desc: Analyze a stock's performance by reviewing its financial statements, management team, and industry trends. [SEC](https://www.sec.gov/)

nodes.title: Set a selling strategy
nodes.desc: Determine when to sell a stock based on its performance, market trends, and your investment goals. [CNBC](https://www.cnbc.com/2020/02/27/when-to-sell-stocks.html)

nodes.title: Use stop-loss orders
nodes.desc: Set a stop-loss order to automatically sell a stock if it falls below a certain price. [Investopedia](https://www.investopedia.com/terms/s/stoploss.asp)

nodes.title: Monitor market news
nodes.desc: Stay up-to-date with market news and trends to make informed decisions about buying and selling stocks. [Bloomberg](https://www.bloomberg.com/)

nodes.title: Diversify your portfolio
nodes.desc: Spread your investments across different asset classes to minimize risk. [Forbes](https://www.forbes.com/sites/forbesfinancecouncil/2020/02/20/the-importance-of-diversification-in-investing/?sh=4b4444c66f2c)

nodes.title: Consider dollar-cost averaging
nodes.desc: Invest a fixed amount of money at regular intervals to reduce the impact of market volatility. [Kiplinger](https://www.kiplinger.com/investing/601853/dollar-cost-averaging)
